186019865.review:
Tomb Raider is a solid game that is still worth playing in 2025, but it’s important to view it in the context of its release date. If you're playing it for the first time now, you might find it mediocre, or even disappointing in terms of graphics and story. However, we must remember that this game was released in 2013, and for its time, the graphics were impressive and one of the best available.

When it comes to the story, I would say it's also quite average. There are several moments that felt forced or illogical, and some parts of the plot seemed a bit too contrived. At times, the narrative felt like it was relying too heavily on plot armor to move things forward, which made the story feel a bit less engaging.

Overall, Tomb Raider holds up well in terms of its visuals, especially when considering its 2013 release date. While it may not match the level of newer games, it’s still quite pleasant to look at. As for the story, it's decent—there are some plot holes, but it's not terrible either. It’s a perfectly average experience that offers a decent balance of action and adventure.

I'm not trying the online/multiplayer yet i just review by single player and story of the games it's might be more fun (Maybe), if you play it with your's friends
 
If you're a fan of classic action-adventure games and can overlook a few dated aspects, Tomb Raider is still an enjoyable game to experience, even years after its release.

186002455.review:
迟来的游戏评价
打折入的三部曲，趁着寒假有空集中精力玩了第一部，打算间隔一个月再玩第二部。
首先是游戏性。古墓丽影9虽然是以古墓为名，但这部的主线剧情属于孤岛求生，古墓探索放在了可供选择的支线古墓中，在游玩的过程中，无论是主线剧情还是我玩过的支线古墓（随缘找到就进去，因此游戏时长不多请见谅），我都不得不佩服制作者对关卡精心的设置和对游戏本身操作最大化的利用，作为一部探索解谜作品绝对是足够优秀的（因为这样我还找过好几次攻略）。
其次是剧情设定。主角超人劳拉，兼具勇敢美丽力量为一身的超人，有一些关卡我真的没想到她竟然是能做到的（尤其是开头的跳板）。剧情在电波塔的希望到飞机坠毁的绝望中一波三折，自救，救人，自救，救人，不得不说劳拉真的很辛苦。故事背景的岛屿场景制作精良，沉静感十足，最后打断女王施法的决战又增添了盗墓笔记式的魔幻色彩。
最后是战斗系统。劳拉的战斗工具多样，战斗总体上以射击为主，还是挺不错的，唯一个人感觉美中不足可能是劳拉真的杀太多人了，有几处我认为可以引开敌人的部分，最后都变成我不得不把他们一一做掉，感觉在这一点上有所违背古墓探索的初衷。
期待接下来会玩的崛起，听说是部集大成作，如果有打折，感兴趣，入就完事了，包不亏的。

185966536.review: I loved Tomb Raider. The growth of the main character is one of the strongest points of the game, followed by game-play, then story setting. A game that came out 12 years before I had a chance to play it was completely worth my time and investment. Progression of the character abilities and weapons were handled very well and I truly felt stronger when I arrived at the next campsite. The game-play and combat was excellent and blended so well with the puzzles. The plot was very good and did not drag on. Overall, TR is a magnificent game and should be cherished by the gaming community. I look forward to the sequel and how they improve on such a strong foundation.

185935110.review:
This game has aged surprisingly well in terms of graphics fidelity with stunning visuals, scenes and locations. Not quite fotorealistic and (appropriately) slightly cartoony. Some water-reflections can be immersion-breaking, but otherwise it is great fun to play. The fight scenes and some cut-scenes can be quite bloody and gruesome, and part of the story borders on the horror genre, so I'd categorize this as an adult game. I managed an unhurried 100% completion on normal difficulty in 23h.

I found the puzzles and "parcouring" engaging and quite different from the platforming of previous Tomb Raider games. It rarely is tedious or hard to figure out how to proceed with a very linear plot and world progression. Typically, some areas are revisited with equipment unlocked that is required to collect everything. Even though you can freely change location at certain "break points" in the story, I'd encourage a new player to just complete the story. In case fights are too tough and you feel you need to unlock certain skills or weapon upgrades, that would be the point to backtrack and try to get the collectibles for XP and loot.

185934961.review: Tomb Raider (2013) is an excellent semi-open world game. The story is engaging and enriched by numerous artifacts and documents scattered throughout the world, offering a deeper dive into the lore. The gameplay is entertaining, featuring exciting fast-paced action sequences, though it arguably relies too heavily on quick-time events. One of the standout aspects of the game is its horror atmosphere; the developers did a fantastic job creating a tense and immersive environment. However, as a longtime fan of the Tomb Raider franchise, I found the puzzles and tombs disappointing. The puzzles are overly simple. The tombs are extremely short and, frankly, lack depth or challenge. While it’s a solid game, I hesitate to truly call it a Tomb Raider game. Despite this, I would still recommend it for its enjoyable gameplay and captivating atmosphere.

Com uma narrativa envolvente, jogabilidade equilibrada entre combate, exploração e puzzles, e uma ambientação deslumbrante na ilha de Yamatai, o jogo consegue capturar tanto a tensão quanto a emoção da jornada. 185890920.review:
Absolute cinema. 
Hra vypadá úžasně i na to jak je stará, optimalizace je na dokonalý úrovni, takže všechno jede plynule a kromě cutscének není nikde žádný zbytečný načítání lokací atp. Samotná hra je úžasná, když jsem ji kupoval, tak jsem nečekal a ani si nepamatoval, že takhle vynikající je. Příběh je absolutní skvost, zápletky hnou srdcem a zahraje to na city - zároveň to efektivně rozvíjí postavy a posouvá příběh vpřed. Collectibles jsou zábava, ať už to jsou hrobky nebo různý zápisníky a tak dále, všechno má svoje pěkný místečko a člověku to nedá se tam nedostat a polootit, co jde. Herní mechaniky jsou skvělý, jsou dobře prezentovaný a jsou využívaný celou hru a taky se celou hru postupně vylepšujou a dávají nový a nový možnosti jak postupovat ostrovem. Určitě jedna z her, kterou nehraju naposledy a nelituju jedinýho dolaru, co jsem za ni dal. 10/10

185887991.review:
[h1]На изломе судьбы[/h1]
[hr][/hr]
[b]Судьба даёт испытания только тем, кто готов их пройти![/b]

[h3]Из легенды в человека (и обратно)[/h3]
[i]Tomb Raider (2013) — это переосмысление классической серии об археологе и искательнице приключений Ларе Крофт, которая возвращается в новом, более мрачном и реалистичном формате. Игра, разработанная Crystal Dynamics и выпущенная Square Enix, рассказывает о первых шагах Лары на пути становления легендарной героиней.
Когда я впервые запустил игру, это было не просто возвращение к одной из любимых игровых серий детства — это был совершенно новый опыт. Если раньше Лара Крофт казалась мне идеальной и почти недосягаемой, то в этой игре я увидел человека: уязвимого, испуганного, но при этом невероятно сильного. Это и зацепило меня больше всего.

[h3]С корабля — да прямо на остров страданий[/h3]
С самого начала история затягивает. Молодая Лара оказывается на этом жутком острове после кораблекрушения, и буквально первые минуты дают понять, что легко ей не будет. Я помню, как переживал за неё в каждой сцене. Каждое падение, каждый раненый бок или застрявшая в ноге стрела — всё это ощущалось почти физически. Я видел, как она страдает, как боится, как находит в себе силы двигаться дальше, и поневоле начинал ей искренне сочувствовать.

Сам остров — это отдельная магия. Он дышит своей жизнью: пещеры, заброшенные храмы, шум дождя и потрескивание костра. Я порой забывал о цели миссии, просто бродил по локациям, собирал артефакты, читал дневники и наслаждался этим атмосферным миром. Тут же хотел бы заострить внимание на графической составляющей. Она в игре довольно неплоха, особенно учитывая, что игра 2013 года. Для своего времени это было что-то с чем-то, да даже сейчас игра смотрится более чем хорошо.

[h3]С луком наперевес[/h3]
Боевая система в игре довольно простая, но, тем не менее, совсем не напрягающая. Сначала я немного боялся, что всё сведётся к стрельбе и экшену, но игра даёт выбор: хочешь — используй лук и стелс, хочешь — иди напролом. Лук, кстати, стал моим любимым оружием, и я до сих пор считаю его идеальным инструментом выживания. Хотя сюда ещё можно добавить пистолет, если его прокачать, то геймплей Рембо заиграет новыми красками) 

[h3]Эмоции на выживание[/h3]
Но что больше всего меня впечатлило — это то, как игра показывает Лару не супергероиней, а обычным человеком. Ты видишь её страх, её сомнения, её боль. Она кричит, когда падает, плачет, когда убивает человека в первый раз. Это так по-человечески, что моментально сближает тебя с ней. И вот именно для того, чтобы получить все те эмоции, которые хотели передать разработчики, я рекомендую проходить игру хотя бы на средней (но не на минимальной сложности), потому как на ней играть скучновато, ну а если вы ещё и бежите напролом и стреляете, то противники покажутся вам фактически обычными манекенами)  

[h3]Лара, ты зависла![/h3]
Конечно, у игры есть и минусы. Например, мне хотелось больше сложных головоломок, как в старых частях. Да, здесь есть загадки, но они скорее простые и служат для разнообразия. Но знаете, это не сильно испортило общего впечатления. А вот что иногда немного раздражало, так это баги. То Лара в воздухе зависнет, то за уступ не зацепится, то катсцена не идёт дальше, и тому подобное. Пусть они и не появлялись каждую минуту, но неприятный осадочек всё-таки остался.  

[h3]Итоговое мнение[/h3]
По итогу, можно сказать, что данная часть вышла более чем успешной. Если вы фанат приключенческих игр, то игра должна вам непременно понравиться!
[/i]

185886869.review: It still feels amazing, playable and enjoyable after 12 years. Despite being old, better than shadow of tomb raider for sure.

185886764.review:
Tomb Raider — это одна из тех игр, которые захватывают с первых минут и не отпускают до самого конца. А милая Лара  стала моей первой вайфу. Я потратил на неё больше 30 часов, и за это время игра не разочаровала меня. Все элементы — от боёв до головоломок — сбалансированы очень хорошо, а атмосфера и сюжет действительно погружают в мир Лары Крофт. Боевка была очень динамичной и интересной, а исследование различных локаций — настоящим удовольствием.

Я прошёл основную часть игры и открыл почти все достижения, что было не так просто, так как игра требует внимательности и решения множества задач. Однако я не играю в сетевые режимы, поэтому достижения, связанные с многопользовательскими режимами, остались для меня недоступными. Но даже без них, я получил массу удовольствия и думаю, что игра стоит того, чтобы её пройти полностью. Если вы любите приключения, исследования и хорошую боёвку, Tomb Raider — отличный выбор!

일단 게임성은 기존의 툼 레이더 대비 좋아진 것 맞네요. 다만 라이즈 오브 툼레이더를 먼저 플레이했기 때문인지 약간 불편한 느낌은 있습니다. 

게임성은 꽤 준수합니다. 손도끼를 한 개만 들고 다니는게 좀 오색하긴해도 적응하면 괜찮고요. 

다만 초반에 Q를 타이밍 맞춰서 눌러야 한다거나 하는 등의 플레이를 강제하는 부분에서 조금 힘들었습니다. 정확한 튜토리얼이 없다보니 이해하는데 조금 시간이 걸리더군요. 

그리고 조작 보정 전혀없이 조작성이 나쁜건 여기서도 마찬가지네요. 그래도 적응을 하면 어떻게든 됩니다. 

다만 종교 의식 한다고 떼로 몰려있는 애들 사이에서 샘을 구출한다고 활 한번 날리고 나니까 적들이 우르르 몰려와서 x나 짓밟은것 보고 벙쪘네요. 아니 총에 샷건에 라이플도 있는데 그게 최선이었니?

후반에도 마찬가지 샘을 구해야하는데 갑자기 활을 꺼내더니 바람 세다고 포기하질 않나. 다시 개고생해서 접근까지 했는데 갑자기 활을 또 꺼내서 겨누다가 얻어맞질 않나. 아니 강풍이 부는 곳에서 굳이 활 꺼내야 겠니?

그리고 초반에 활만 있는 상태에서 풀무장한 적을 죽였는데 총기 파밍 안해요? 화살 파망만 하고 끝내는건 뭐지? 그러다가 갑자기 주변 시체에서 무기 빼내서 무장 갖추는건 뭐지? 

이건 주인공의 뇌가 청순한건지 게임 기획자가 뇌가 없는 건지 모르겠음.

Tomb Raider 2013 – это впечатляющий перезапуск культовой серии, который сочетает в себе насыщенный сюжет, захватывающий экшен и великолепную атмосферу. Игра предлагает увлекательное исследование острова, заполненного тайнами, опасностями и головоломками. Развитие персонажа Лары Крофт хорошо проработано, а её трансформация из неопытной девушки в храброго выживальщика выглядит правдоподобно.

Графика и звук на высоте: окружение детализировано, а эффекты создают атмосферу напряжения. Боевая система динамичная, хотя враги иногда предсказуемы. Единственный минус – линейность игры, что может разочаровать любителей полного погружения в открытый мир.

Вердикт: Обязательно к прохождению для фанатов экшен-игр и приключений.

185766876.review:
Truth is I recommend this game, but I have issues that I feel like are important to address and that you are probably looking for if you hit the negative review button.

One word I'd use to describe this game as a whole is... Mediocre
Graphics, still hold up and are well done
but gameplay is... finicky
the story, the main over arching story is well done, the little bits though are... ehh, hit or miss really
TL:DR at the bottom

Graphics, They hold up, if you're looking for problems then you'll find them like flat planes used for the hair, Lara being the only character who's appearance changes throughout the game, repeating texture tiling, there's issues and there's more of them. Most of the time, you really don't notice them or are in the background enough to not draw your attention. Otherwise the graphics are fairly stunning at times, things are well communicated like having climbing walls use one textures or jumps/scramble jumps using white paint, it's communicative and well thought out. 

Gameplay. As I said it's finicky, there's jumps that you should be able to do but the game stops you, there's literally a door in the third act Lara could very easily climb over to get to a secret lab yet you can't climb it at all. At times I also felt frustrated with the parkour cause I knew I could make a jump and I knew how, but the character was difficult to control. There's not a lot of parkour either, and it's all very basic stuff, was left dissapointed and wanting more; even with my previous stated issue, it wasn't that bad.
combat was interesting, you get four weapons and there's a simple but good stealth system, my biggest problem is at times, it feels like you're supposed to action hero your way through instead of stealth, which is fine, if it didn't put a checkpoint right at the door and when you load said checkpoint, all the enemies aggro onto you as if they've seen you the entire time. Otherwise, finishers are quick and impactful, combat has a fair amount of unique moves like throwing sand into peoples eyes or doing a dodge attack with a qte, I enjoyed it at least.
Concerning other mechanics, the upgrade system is fairly good, though there's a problem with scrap that I'll get to in a moment. But finding parts for your weapons and using experience to upgrade what moves Lara can do felt good and well paced overall. However, the hunting system is annoying, the biggest problem with it is that when you can't find any more scrap boxes, you're next way to get scrap is to hunt animals once you've gotten a perk, and it was not only so slow, but if you hunt in an area too much, the animals stop spawning and you get a notification saying that the area is hunted out. This wouldn't be a problem if the game told you when animals would start spawning again if at all. I ended up using cheat engine to get the final bit of scrap I needed cause it was no longer enjoyable trying to find an animal to kill
Speaking of hunting, this game feels a little confused on what it wants to be if it wants to be a survival or action game, thankfully there's no hunger cause that'd be miserable with the hunting mechanic, but it feels like they realized it last minute and quickly patched something over it. I dunno how to put it.
Also the Camera can be quite frustrating to work with when you're looking up but walking around something to get a better look at it

Finally, the story, don't worry, no spoilers... cause the game spoils itself. in reality, I'll only talk about one of the characters and remain vague on the story. Now as I said before, the overarching story is good, good plot, good them, good location. The problem is every moment inbetween I can tell you right now that every character is forgettable, I don't even remember their names except Lara, Sam, and Roth and for different reasons. Lara is obvious, she's the main character. Sam is the titular damsel in distress, so you'll remember her name from Lara and any other character screaming out her name. Roth is the only character that seems to actually care about Lara and help her out. Any others don't appear or the spoiler I mentioned earlier, the twist villian who is so obvious you can read it from a mile away though thankfully he gets the deserving death of a twist villian as the actual villian does his thing.

TL:DR of this, Graphics hold up well, gameplay is finicky, story is mediocre with most of the characters being forgettable.
Get the game if it's going cheap, it'll keep you occupied, at it's current price it's also not too bad though you may be better shoving it into your wishlist and waiting on getting it till a sell happens.

Tomb Rider (2013)

Томб Райдер зацепила меня с первых минут. Она короткая, но в этом её прелесть. Мое прохождение заняло около 10 часов, и за это время игра не даёт заскучать ни на минуту. Она очень плотная на события: тут тебе и динамичные сцены погонь, и напряжённые перестрелки, и моменты выживания, которые держат в напряжении от начала до конца.

Сюжет здесь довольно простой, но он работает. История о том, как молодая Лара Крофт, попав на загадочный остров после кораблекрушения, борется за выживание и постепенно превращается в настоящую героиню. Мне, правда, не очень понравилось, что некоторые моменты сюжета объясняются паранормальными явлениями. Я бы предпочёл больше реализма, но, возможно, для серии Tomb Raider это нормально. Я не знаком с предыдущими играми серии, так что не могу судить, насколько это соответствует духу франшизы.

8/10

185687764.review:
游戏距离发售已经十年多了，但是直到现在很多场景依然震撼，故事讲的是劳拉作为一个考古系的小女生是如何在探索玛雅泰文明的这些“accident”中成长为一个女强人的故事

游戏全程40小时左右，我最高难度39小时通关，全收集预计50左右，并不算长，旦每一个场景都是慢慢经费的味道，这40小时充斥着高质量关卡和剧情，完全没有浪费时间的的跑图，练级等凑时长的内容，很干。

先说优点
古墓丽影9中的动作解谜关卡绝对是行业内数一数二的，我个人认为有些攀爬解密关卡比神秘海域系列更为精妙，不会出现卡关查攻略的问题，仔细想想肯定能过，但是又不会显得傻瓜无脑，很多关卡一时半会还真得想想。动作关卡也设计的极其巧妙，不简单，有时候真得多过几次才能抓住timming，运镜非常有技术，场景构造也是恰到好处，劳拉的肢体动作非常的灵活自然，在有风的时候会弓下腰抬起手慢慢走，在掩体后面会靠着掩体遮掩自己。所有的动作就是两个字丝滑。

这里剧透警告：主角的刻画的并不差，确实写出了劳拉一开始的青涩，到之后女武神般的角色，但对于劳拉之外的人的人格刻画略有欠缺，眼镜小哥alex再多做做刻画能狠狠的赚一波眼泪，莫迪老头也没做什么文章，在剧情上死的作用也不是很大。导师罗斯确实很催泪，旦并不够，也没写出黑妹和罗斯夫妻关系的细节，后面黑妹因此讨厌劳拉也讨厌的很问号。博士的刻画做的很好，真的很奸诈的感觉，死的时候真爽，这点很不错
总体剧情算优点

价格steam很便宜，毕竟很老的游戏，几十块钱，但是绝对物超所值

最后一个优点：劳拉真好看

缺点
放在最前面的一定是bug，古墓丽影9的bug并不少见，恶性bug也存在，打钢铁胖子的时候画面会一直卡住，完全没有办法，存档点少导致每次都要重新打20分钟左右的进度，最后查了锁60帧关垂直同步可解决。旦据网上的评价，这一定不是少数，更多抽象的bug层出不穷，但好在基本都能解决。

存档点少，每次重新进游戏你以为存上了的时候发现上一个auto save还在半个小时之前，最抽象的是你死了会在一个很近的存档复活，你以为那个是存档，但实际上只是复活点，贼崩溃。好在能手动存档，一定一定要多存档啊。
最后，多人模式已经鬼服了，但可以理解，时间太久了。
游戏性9 画面8 剧情8 操作性8细节处理9
主观评分：9
在这个价格下，绝对是必玩的精品

185657863.review:
Meine Spielzeit = 30,9 Stunden 
(1x flüssiges Durchspielen ohne alle Caches, Dokumente, Reliquien, Herausforderungen waren = ~24 Stunden – wohl auch ohne extreme Hetze machbar in ~15 Stunden)
vom 4. bis 14. Januar 2025
Mein Alter = 48

Knapp 12 Jahre nach Veröffentlichung (5. März 2013) des 10. Titels der Tomb Raider Reihe, deren ersten 3 Teile ich 1996, 1997 & 1998 direkt bei Marktstart gekauft und begeistert in meiner Studienzeit gespielt hatte, war meine Sehnsucht nach der Ikone Lara Croft (bzw. ganz allgemein nach gemeinsamen Abenteuern mit der holden Weiblichkeit ;-P) so groß geworden, dass mich Lara wieder in ihren Bann zog.
Insbesondere die wertungstechnisch schlechten Teile 4-6 (Angel of Darkness als Tiefpunkt), aber auch die angeblich guten Teile 7-9 (Legend. Anniversary & Underworld) waren aufgrund dem Lauf des Lebens/Familienplanung, VaterDaseins an mir vorbei gegangen und auch danach hatte ich trotz früher teils exzessiven Zockens bis auf ein wenig Heartstone, Heroes of the Storm und WarCraft Rumble nahezu gar kein Computer mehr gespielt.
Es hatte einfach andere Prioritäten gegeben (u.a. Wahrheits-/Freiheitskampf, Traumabewältigung und Sport), doch nun mit weit reichenden gesundheitlichen Problemen, die mich sportlich einschränken, kam das Zocken als Betätigung/Rückzugsort wieder auf den Schirm.
Und Lara und ich hatten unsere Beziehung (zumindest ich von meiner Seite ;-P) nie wirklich beendet, so dass ein erneutes Rendezvous überfällig war … und was soll ich sagen?
Eine so lange Trennung kann auch vieles besser machen, denn die Seiten die mir Lara nun mit ihrem sogenannten Neustart der Serie in ihrer Geschichten von 2013 offenbarte (die ihre Anfänge/Wandlung zur knallharten Abenteurerin erzählte) waren deutlich anziehender und mitreissender als die kühle Femme Fatale, die ich 1996-1998 und dann in den 2 Kinofilmen (2001 & 2003 mit der manischen Angelina Jolie) kennen lernen durfte.
Nicht nur, dass sie/der Titel (grafisch^^) sehr gut aussieht (2013 muss das der OberHammer gewesen sein), auch die Geschichte und ihr Charakter, der durchaus Nahbarkeit/Verletzlichkeit und echte Weiblichkeit (trotz ihres Überlebenswillens) zeigt, lies mich in meiner Polarität als Mann mehr mit ihr „schwingen“.
Wenn man so lange wie ich (~15 Jahre) kein wirkliches ActionSpiel mehr gezockt hat und dann mit Lara *Vorsicht kleiner Spolier NUR in der nächsten Zeile* 
auf der Insel Yamatai strandet, dann kann man kaum anders, als überwältigt zu sein.

Immer wieder wusste ich gar nicht wie mir geschah.
Die Immersion, 
die vielen Zwischensequenzen, 'Flinke-Zeit'-Ereignisse und Charakterinteraktionen auf der einen Seite 
und 
dann die toll inszenierten Action-/Rätsel-/Kletterpassagen auf der anderen Seite 
die mir in extrem gutem LevelDesign dargeboten wurden,
liesen mich immer wieder mit offener Kinnlade zurück.

Als riesiger Indiana Jones Fan (neben 'Prince of Persia' von 1989 wohl die Hauptwurzeln von Tomb Raider) wurde hier (wenn auch leider nur virtuell) mein großes AbenteurerHerz auf eine Art berührt/in Resonanzschwingung gebracht, dass ich mich sehr oft ertappte, die Grenzen zwischen Realität und Spiel nicht mehr wirklich zu spüren.
Das hatte bisher selten bzw. nie ein Spiel so vermocht.
Auch die Sounduntermalung (neben der stimmigen Grafik/Licht- & Schattenspielen) war sehr gelungen und auch die Musik war stets passend und im richtigen Maße „dem sich hinein gezogen fühlend“/der Stimmung förderlich (die deutsche Syncro von Nora Tschirner empfand ich auch äußerst passend!).

Und dann diese wunderschönen, spektakulären Level, die wie ihre früher eng anliegende (Hot-)Pants wie angegossen für so eine „Hüpfmaus“ *ääähm...  räusper * agile, athletische Akrobatin wie Lara gemacht waren …
ATEMBERAUBEND!

Die Geschichte fand' ich jetzt auch nicht wirklich flach auch wenn die Nebenfiguren evtl. ein bisschen mehr Tiefe vertragen hätte und ich das absolute Ende 
[ganz normales Stöckchen ohne mystische Aufwertung“ (Ja ich glaube durchaus an Dinge zwischen Himmel und Erde, die sich nicht immer positivistisch erklären/beweisen lassen)] punktuell schon ein bisschen unglaubwürdig empfand.
Glaubhaft kam dafür aber auf jeden Fall für mich rüber, dass so ein Erlebnis auf Yamatai (wenn man es denn überlebt) einen stärker und wissbegierig fragender macht – eine Geburtsstunde halt für die außergewöhnliche Abenteurerin, die man schon vorher kannte nun aber menschlich noch identifizierbarer ist.
Tja... ihr Vater hatte MIT SO VIELEM recht …

Ich kann es auf jeden Fall kaum erwarten mich an Laras Seite in die nächsten Abenteuer 'Rise of the Tomb Raider (2015)' und 'Shadow of the Tomb Raider (2018)' zu stürzen, auch wenn ich leider schon gesehen habe, dass die Optik von Lara ein wenig geändert wurde (Wieso? … noch dazu nicht zum Besseren m.M. nach...) und auch ihre deutsche Syncronsprecherin ausgetauscht wurde.
Leider nicht so identifikationsförderlich  - insbesondere da es sich ja um eine abgeschlossen Trilogie handelt.

Das tut der Grandiosität von 'Tomb Raider (2013)' aber keinen Abbruch und nach einer Nacht Drüberschlafens nach erstmaligem Durchspielen bin ich immer noch extremst begeistert
Absolute Empfehlung:
91 von 100 Punkte

185567581.review:
It's been nearly 12 year and I wanted to give the now titled "Survivor Trilogy" one... probably last play through.

Tomb Raider 2013 was likely my first "modern cinematic" game back then and I was partially annoyed but also enthralled.
Some hand holding and restricted movement felt somewhat annoying when I was previously used to complete "freedom" in older games. For example the "taking away" of controls when transitioning to cut scenes, forced walking and some other stuff like jumping and the character balancing itself on ropes. You are just pressing forward and the character walks itself over the rope. But for the longest time I don't have an issue with that anymore... if it is not overdone:
Shadow of the Tomb Raider for example had too much forced slow walking and too many slow transitions. Just pressing "forward" for up to 5 minutes is starting to get really annoying. I am here to play a game after all.

Now if it comes Tomb Raider 2013 itself... by now it is a bit rough around the edges and has a more wonky camera compared to its two sequels. Visuals also look dated by now. Not to a detrimental degree, but Rise just looks soo much better.

Apart from that it is still a great game. Gameplay Loop is still satisfying and mostly smooth.

TLDR: If you can live with the somewhat dated visuals I can definitely still recommend it

185561795.review:
Picked the game up on sale recently in a bundle with the later projects and I'm so glad I did. For an "older" game it plays beautifully and is an absolute blast. I was a bit concerned early on just getting thrown into the story without much prior knowledge of tomb raider media, but boy does this game catch you up quick. The story is beautifully written and dribbled throughout the game. The documents scattered throughout the several map areas, while not vital to understanding the story, are perfect additions to further appreciating the already solid plot. Moreover, the voice overs for the documents are a magnificent touch as it makes the subplots and main cast contributions more poignant instead of the all too common "read this essay yourself and make heads or tails of it" present in modern games. They are short, sweet, and are actually worth collecting! 

The gameplay is incredibly fun and well-ahead of its time. Save some minor inconveniences with jumping on to ropes and falling to my death multiple times (which was a result of me being impatient and not waiting for the jump prompt), I had no complaints or annoyances. Returning to completed areas to 100% them were fun adventures to further explore the already unique landscapes and find cool new locations. The addition of the treasure maps was more than welcome, especially when it came to finding the geocaches.  The only real challenge was completing the challenges as the objectives were well hidden in most areas and difficult to find. Thankfully, there is a wealth of guides on youtube that were a fun trip back in time to see the old editing style of 2010's videos. 

Lastly, the weapon upgrade system was fun to grind towards despite being expensive to 100% every weapon. If you are more casual gamer and not looking to loot every body, crate, animal, and so forth then you do have to be more picky with what you choose. However, these upgrades, while powerful and well worth grinding, are not necessary to be an effective player. The skill tree system was somewhat lack luster. I rarely used many of the skills throughout my play through but were still a fun touch. 

I must concur with another review I read, it truly did feel like I was playing through an amazing action movie. 9.5/10, a classic game that I will surely return to down the road. Excited to see what the later projects bring!

185552992.review: 这个版本的劳拉不再是穿戴高科技装备上天入地无所不能的劳拉了，而是一个轮船失事与伙伴走散的小女孩。虽然没有当初宣传的那样侧重求生。但是还是给人耳目一新的感觉。而且标志性武器弓是以前所有版本所看不见的。游戏中的遗物也不一定是古物，与游戏本身剧情无关但是又围绕着邪马台在走，所以说不算神作 但是绝对难得，本部的劳拉也是非常的美丽，堪称3A的美女女主扛把子，求生的味道也变得相当厚重，因为劳拉“变弱”了，但这种弱更多的体现在性格上，在战斗中劳拉依然是奎爷一样的BUG级存在。本作中的劳拉遇到危险时不再是那样的处变不惊，酷酷的轻松应付一切了。她更多的会害怕，会哭泣，甚至会绝望到想要放弃，虽然最后总能坚持下去，但无疑都要经历一个艰难的挣扎过程，这样细腻的设计让玩家能感受到更多，同更像人类的身材比例一样，在情感上劳拉也变得极具亲和力，堪称最有人性的一姐。《古墓丽影9》的战斗部分非常出色，远超系列以往作品，基本达到了《神秘海域》的高度，武器很丰富，每隔一段流程都能得到新的武器，时刻保持玩家的新鲜感，以此为基础玩家既可以选择火爆刚正面，也可以走猥琐暗杀路线，其中眼下流行的弓箭在本作中同样大放异彩，无声的玩弄死蠢萌的敌人，无疑是非常有成就感的事情。相对于战斗部分的大幅加强，游戏的其它部分则显得有些单薄了，《古墓丽影》最为玩家称道的解谜部分被缩减到几乎可以忽略，迷题又少又简单，并加入了流行的“本能”系统，其实就是变向的给玩家提示，进一步减小了玩家因迷题而卡关的可能性，这在保证游戏爽快感的同时，确实让一部分热爱解谜的玩家而感到失落，从本质上看重启后的《古墓丽影》基本已完全转型为了TPS游戏，解谜只是小小的点缀。

185542909.review:
A great re-imagining of a fantastic franchise. While this isn't my favourite Tomb Raider game and it is definitely overshadowed by its sequels this is still an amazing game with fantastic gameplay.

I anticipate that this game will become less well regarded over time as it has the least to offer of any of the three in its trilogy and lacks a lot of elements that were popular in earlier titles.

The absolute best thing about the game was that it introduced the bow. I love the bow gameplay and I hope they keep it in future Tomb Raider games.

Unfortunately, the best I can say for the story is that it is there and it isn't very bad. None of the characters are engaging or well written. None of the plot points are well conceived, but instead borrowed from genre film and literature. None of it is particularly well executed. Despite there being more effort towards a plot than earlier TR games, the characters have suffered and all feel like very generic.

The one disappointing thing about the game is that nearly all of the best locations are frantic, single use, action set pieces that you are never allowed to revisit or explore.

Despite those negative points, the gameplay is great and I regularly replay the game through to completion.

185509237.review:
It's been more than a decade since Tomb Raider's original release, and more than a decade since I first played in my now dead and gone 360. It was good back then, it's still good now. I'm not the biggest fan of this reboot's characterization of Lara, mostly because she keeps being portrayed, at least in this game, as someone for the player to protect.

And then she goes and drives her rifle into an enemy's face and just pulls the trigger over, and over, and over again. This Lara is ruthless, actively bloodthirsty and lowkey unhinged. The world is utterly unforgiving to her, and yet she fights, and wins. The plot itself is nothing to write home about, your random cult on a cursed island kidnaps your friends and you try to rescue them all, with varying degrees of success. It's serviceable as an excuse for Lara to go from point A to point B and as an introduction to her newest iteration.

The moment to moment gameplay is littered with combat arenas and shooting galleries, which are fun, as Lara is practically Rambo-ing her way through them. Sadly, the tombs might as well be absent. So, not much tomb raiding in this one. In any case, it's a solid game that will offer you some fun in exchange for not thinking too hard about the story.

185480439.review:
Tomb Raider (2013) sets out the reboot, creating Lara's humanistic viewpoint on the world, a normal person with a thrill for adventure, it captivates the player by showing what happened to her and how it mentally and physically affected her, taking her first human kill, getting injured, morally feeling bad for killing animals, a sense of realism and unknowing, something a Tomb Raider game has never really shown before, usually just holding Lara as a strong feminine icon who can tackle anything. By creating a backstory in which she follows her father's research it gives you a reason as to why she's in Yamatai in the first place, it builds her character whilst also taking you through a story focused on exploration and puzzle. It gives her a reason to become an archaeologist, to define herself, and to seek answers.

You do not lose that legendary icon, rather progress her and build her up, YOU as the player are creating what she becomes in later games, whilst this is not choices matter game, this is HER story and how she becomes the hardened survivor and archaeologist she is in previous and later titles, whether it be Core Design's Lara or LAU Lara. This game follows the same routine as previous titles, going to an ancient site whilst visiting smaller ruins and extra tombs throughout, causing you to build her skills, knowledge and strength. This IS a Tomb Raider game, and this IS how Lara grew to be that legendary character she is and always has been.

Watching Lara grow and change from this emotional and sympathetic character to one who knows how to protect herself and knows how to survive whilst taking what's hers is a journey worth the reward it gives you.

My only downside is with the lack of sprinting as it can drag out the game, as you then resort to continuously scrambling everywhere. I do however highly recommend this game to Tomb Raider fans, progressionists, story rich fans and those looking to breach out into puzzle driven action adventures.

Преимущества:
   Записки с озвучкой, которые можно прослушать сразу или же в инвентаре в любой момент.
При вскрытии ящиков предмет сразу падает в инвентарь и не надо после вскрытия ящика подбирать еще и его.
Русская озвучка главной героини от Сары Ирен Уитакер

Недостатки: 
   Геймплей - бесконечный гринд и из него вытекающие: ужасно душные точки интереса - аванпосты от юбисофт. Под гробницами в прямом смысле понимается мусорный аванпост в награду за который дают улучшение оружия, которое в принципе уже не нуждается в улучшении даже на максимальной сложности.
На карте не отмечены звездой испытания и сами они по себе незаметные - как будто элементы декора.
   Сюжет: Лара мертва для меня - после тяжелого пробития арматурой в самом начале игры.
   В техническом плане: на рабочем столе ярлык игры отображается просто белым файлом.
При запуске игры на пару секунд на экране появляется непонятный артефакт.
Игру невозможно свернуть из полного экрана - сразу будет крашить.

185208492.review:
Прошёл игру в 2025 году. И если вдруг вам, за каким то хреном, интересно мнение об этой игре в 2025 или позже, то я вообще это никому не рекомендую. Сюжет о становлении героини - штамп на штампе и штампом погоняет. Нет никакой внятной предыстории о Ларе и её спутниках, всё подаётся через дневники, письма и редкие кат-сцены. Поэтому когда спутники начинают один за другим помирать, то это не вызывает ничего кроме зевоты. Постановщик кат-сцен натуральный психопат, физически больно смотреть, как Лара 
[b] постоянно 	[/b] откуда то падает, бьётся об все предметы или её жестоко лупят злодеи. Геймплей в 2013, возможно, смотрелся неплохо, но сейчас он совсем не развлекает. Не бесит и на том спасибо. Выживание закончилось на первой локации где по сюжету надо было подстрелить оленя, далее охота на животных нужна только ради ачивок. Детали для улучшения оружия можно собрать без проблем без истребления животных. Бои с врагами на клавомыши никаких сложностей не представляют, патронов в избытке, хэдшоты работают исправно. Расхищение гробниц в игре представляет из себя 5 или 7 подземелий где нужно решить простенькую головоломку. Исследование локаций присутствует, но помимо десятков предметов типа артефактов, дневников, тайников есть ещё и испытания на каждой локации, которые не отображаются на карте и это просто шиза. Искать без гайдов этот ебучий 10-ый гриб просто пытка, поэтому если у вас нет навязчивой идеи пылесосить все локации на 100% сразу проходите мимо. Ничего кроме небольшого количества опыта это не даёт. Ах да, игра пересолена QTE-моментами, которые тогда были в тренде, но сейчас это просто раздражает.

ИТОГ: я не могу выделить ни одной стороны этой игры, которая бы меня зацепила. Вся игра довольно плохо состарилась. Если есть желание поиграть за Лару, то можно начинать сразу с Rise of the tomb raider. Сюжетно эти игры связаны оч слабо, ничего не пропустите. Продолжение геймплейно лучше во всём, сюжет такая же шиза, но тут ничего не поделаешь - Рианна Пратчетт сценаристка обеих игр.

185202708.review:
An Incredible Reboot of the Franchise

2013’s Tomb Raider successfully reinvents the series while staying true to its roots, delivering a thrilling, emotional, and action-packed adventure. The game brings Lara Croft to life in a way that’s both fresh and captivating, offering a modern take on the iconic character and setting.

The narrative is compelling, with a much more personal and emotional story than you might expect from a typical action game. It follows Lara Croft as she’s stranded on an island, struggling for survival and discovering her inner strength. Watching Lara evolve from an inexperienced, vulnerable young woman into the legendary adventurer fans know and love is an incredible journey, and the game does a fantastic job of making you care about her story.

The gameplay is a perfect balance of exploration, combat, and puzzle-solving. The combat is smooth and satisfying, with a variety of weapons and skills at your disposal. The stealth mechanics are a great addition, allowing you to approach situations with strategy and cunning. The game also features a rich and immersive world, with beautiful environments to explore, from lush forests to ancient temples. Each area is filled with secrets to discover, making exploration rewarding and fun.

The puzzles, while simpler than in previous Tomb Raider titles, are still engaging and offer a nice break from the intense combat sequences. They’re well-designed and fit naturally within the world, providing a satisfying challenge without feeling overly difficult.

Visually, the game is stunning. The island is brought to life with incredible detail, from the weather effects to the lush, realistic environments. Lara’s character model is detailed and expressive, and the animation is top-notch, making it feel like you’re truly guiding her through the journey. The soundtrack also complements the game beautifully, adding to the atmosphere and tension of the story.

2013’s Tomb Raider is a fantastic reboot that breathes new life into the franchise. It’s an exciting, well-rounded experience that offers a perfect mix of action, exploration, and storytelling. Whether you’re a longtime Tomb Raider fan or new to the series, this game is a must-play for anyone who loves strong characters, engaging gameplay, and unforgettable adventures.

185118660.review:
After completing 75% of Tomb Raider (2013), including the main story but excluding some optional tombs and achievements, I can confidently say that this game delivers a solid and thrilling experience. As a reboot of the iconic franchise, it successfully brings Lara Croft into a new era, combining engaging narrative elements with modern gameplay mechanics.  

Narrative and Character Development
The portrayal of Lara Croft is one of the game’s highlights. As a young and inexperienced adventurer, Lara’s journey is both exciting and frustrating at times. Her character is well-written, but her naivety stands out, especially in the early parts of the game. While this makes her development feel more realistic, it can also be a bit jarring during moments when her survival instincts should have been more prominent. Still, by the end of the game, Lara evolves into a hardened survivor, which is satisfying to witness.

Gameplay and Mechanics
For a game released in 2013, the mechanics hold up remarkably well. The climbing mechanics, in particular, are smooth and intuitive, making exploration feel fluid and rewarding. The combat system is well-designed, though at times it can feel a bit repetitive. However, the blend of stealth, action, and puzzle-solving keeps things engaging.  

The optional tombs are a nice addition, offering some interesting puzzles and a change of pace from the main storyline. Even though I skipped some of them, they added depth to the overall experience.  


Final Thoughts
Overall, Tomb Raider (2013) is an excellent action-adventure game that balances narrative and gameplay well. Despite some minor flaws in character portrayal, the game remains highly enjoyable. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who loves adventure games with a touch of mystery. Whether you're a long-time fan of the series or new to it, this reboot is worth your time.

Tämä reboottasi Tomb Raider sarjan vuonna 2013 ja hienosti niin tekikin.

Mutta nyt näin vuonna 2025 peli on jo 12 vuotta vanha, mutta ei sitä juuri mistään huomaa. Tai no, textuurit eivät ole kauhean tarkat nykymittapuulla. Mutta noin muuten graaffisesti peli on vieläkin todella näyttävä.

Mitä tulee suorituskykyyn että pelin saa rullaamaan melkein koneella kuin koneella hyvin kunhan on erillinen näytönohjain.
Nimittäin yritin tätä aluksi pelata Ryzen 5 5600G:n pikku Vega GPU:lla, mutta sillä ei saanut mukavaa pelikokemusta edes low grafiikka asetuksilla vaikka resoluutiona oli 1080p.

Sitten Itse tarinasta ja nyt oli vähän mitä oli. Että ei mitenkään mielenkiintoinen, mutta ei tuota nyt huonoksikaan voi kyllä kutsua.
Loppuvastuksia oli perjaatteessa kaksi, mutta kumpikin oli helppoja ja joista jälkimmäinen oli näitä tyhmiä hakkaa oikeaa nappia oikeaan aikaan juttuja.

Mutta muuten itse peli oli täynnä mukavia puzzleja, tasoloikkaa ja vähän räiskintääkin. Ja itse Laran ohjastaminen oli sujuvaa eli teki aina sitä mitä pyydettiin.

Kaiken kaikkiaan oli siis erinomainen peli.
Seuraavaksi meneekin peluuseen tämän jatko-osa Rise of the Tomb Raideri ja toivotaan että se on vähintäänkin yhtähyvä.

Для мене саме ця частина стала першою зі всієї серії Tomb Raider. Пам'ятаю як ще в далекому 2013 році у мене з'явився диск Tomb Raider. Всі ми тоді були в захваті від оновленної Лари Крофт (і досі більшість любить саме цю версію Лари).

185074449.review:
For better or worse, Tomb Raider made me feel like I was playing through a Hollywood action movie. The set pieces and level designs were dazzling and suspenseful. Character development is significant in the protagonist, but not in many others. Perhaps this intentionally gives the impression that no character is guaranteed to stick around for the sequel other than Lara Croft, whose journey of self-discovery aligns well with her investigation of the menacing island.

Having never played a Tomb Raider game before, I found some humor in the personal nature of this story given the sheer quantity of enemies I had to mow down to get to the end. Lara fires hundreds of bullets and lights people on fire without batting an eye. The first hand-to-hand sequence is especially well-choreographed, and the protagonist’s guilt over taking a life is believable, but after that she might as well be the Terminator. Maybe this kind of action was included in part to smooth over the differences between the campaign and PvP mode, but the latter was of little interest to me in the first place. Its existence felt extraneous given the character-driven nature of the story.

The elaborate explosions propelling me through most of Tomb Raider were enjoyable. The tomb puzzles were a lot of fun too, but I wish I’d saved them for last — as is the case with too many open world games, the hidden items throughout this enormous map are a pain to collect. To me, the selling point of this game is the consistently thrilling action, which literally tears up the entire environment and propels Lara through preposterous odds to survival. Overall, my experience with Tomb Raider was very positive, and I look forward to more smooth, exciting gameplay in the sequel.

**8/10**

185036802.review:
Tengo un poco de amor-odio con este Tomb Raider. Será por el hype que me provocó esas reseñas extremadamente positivas, ya que tras 20 horas de juego no han llegado a cumplir del todo mis expectativas, explico el porqué:

Este juego indudablemente bebe mucho de Uncharted pero aún con la sensación de ser una copia ha hecho las cosas bastante bien. Es un juego frenético con fases de acción en las cuales hay explosiones y derrumbes por todos lados, y la verdad es que están increíblemente bien hechas pero como dice el refrán, "lo poco gusta y lo mucho cansa". Y es que el juego es un constante de derrumbamientos con fuego y explosiones mientras corres o escalas. Esto llega a agotar un poco tras tantas horas de juego. 

Cuando te da un respiro, este Tomb Raider se divide en dos partes, algunas zonas con enemigos bastante disfrutables ya que el sistema de apuntado y cobertura está muy bien implementado y por otra parte zonas de plataforma con bastantes saltos, escaladas y tirolinas. Son zonas muy verticales lo cual los hace algo lioso encontrar el camino pero nada que vaya a resultar un problema.
Aquí podrás aprovechar para encontrar objetos ocultos que te ayudarán a adquirir nuevas habilidades para Lara. 

Hasta aquí la parte que más destaco, pero le he bajado puntos porque el juego está roto, hay montonazo de bugs. Y yo no suelo quejarme, porque a mí me suelen parecer divertidos, pero cuando encuentras algunos que te imposibilitan avanzar, o otros que hacen que llegues a zonas donde aún no deberías de llegar, lo acaba haciendo un poco frustrante. Además de esto, cada vez que cogía ciertos elementos, la frase que me lo indicaba salía descuadrada en la esquina derecha de la pantalla haciendo imposible leer más que las primeras letras. Le falta bastante pulido.

Nota: 7
Conclusión: Probablemente sea de los mejores juegos de aventura de PC, goza de buena historia y es entretenido. Pero es una pena lo lleno de bugs que está. Si te gustan los juegos tipo Uncharted ve a por él, ya que además, en rebajas, está baratito.

《古墓丽影9》作为这个系列重启后的第一部。2013年的游戏在如今看来无论是画质还是游戏性都还是一流水平。特别是本作的劳拉，看着非常年轻且充满活力，完全没有西方一点政治正确在其中掺杂。

至于游戏，本作来到了神秘的“龙三角”地区，去寻找传说中的邪马台和卑弥呼女王。因为剧情需要整个游戏都是阴天，这显得场景特别昏暗，再加上岛上的各种战争遗址和邪教组织，更显得游戏恐怖惊悚，虽然没有任何跳脸惊吓，但游戏气氛十分压抑，玩的人提心吊胆。

总之，古墓丽影三部曲捆绑包打折非常值得入手游玩。

184938282.review:
“No sabía que necesitaba esta aventura hasta que la jugué”

Entré a Tomb Raider (2013) sin expectativas, sin haber tocado antes un juego de la saga. Ahora, después de horas de explorar, sobrevivir y descubrir secretos, puedo decir que esta experiencia me dejó maravillado.

El juego te atrapa desde el primer minuto con una historia intensa que no suelta. Ver a Lara Croft en sus inicios, luchando por sobrevivir, la humaniza de una forma que no esperaba. No es solo una heroína de acción; es vulnerable, valiente y crece junto con el jugador a lo largo de la aventura.

La isla está viva. Cada rincón invita a explorar, y cada nueva tumba oculta ese aire de misterio y peligro que te empuja a seguir adelante. Las mecánicas de combate, caza y escalada se sienten fluidas y naturales, haciendo que cada enfrentamiento o desafío ambiental sea emocionante y satisfactorio.

Gráficamente, incluso hoy, el juego luce impresionante. Los paisajes, las ruinas y los efectos climáticos contribuyen a una atmósfera inmersiva que hace que cada momento se sienta épico.

¿Lo mejor? Esa sensación de logro al superar las pruebas y sentir que te conviertes en parte de la transformación de Lara.

Para alguien que jugaba Tomb Raider por primera vez, esta entrega me hizo querer más. Fue una experiencia que no solo sorprendió, sino que dejó una huella.

10/10 – Una aventura que me recordó por qué amo los videojuegos.

184889082.review:
Évaluation : 🌟🌟🌟🌟 (4/5)
"Tomb Raider (2013) – Une renaissance intense et viscérale de Lara Croft, offrant une aventure palpitante et une héroïne plus humaine que jamais."

Le reboot de Tomb Raider (2013), développé par Crystal Dynamics, marque un tournant décisif dans la saga de Lara Croft. Ce jeu plonge les joueurs dans les origines de l’icône, présentant une Lara plus jeune, vulnérable, mais déterminée à survivre dans un environnement hostile. Avec un mélange parfait d'exploration, de combat, et de puzzles, ce titre redéfinit la série pour une nouvelle génération tout en conservant l'esprit d'aventure des jeux classiques.

Les Points Forts :
✅ Narration et développement de Lara :
L'histoire se concentre sur les origines de Lara Croft, transformant la légende en une personne plus réaliste et accessible. Sa progression de jeune archéologue inexpérimentée à une aventurière aguerrie est captivante et bien racontée, créant un lien émotionnel fort avec les joueurs.

✅ Environnement immersif :
L'île mystérieuse de Yamatai, où se déroule l'aventure, est magnifiquement rendue avec des paysages variés et riches en détails. Les environnements sont non seulement beaux, mais aussi remplis de secrets et de dangers, incitant à l'exploration et à la découverte.

✅ Gameplay fluide :
Le mélange de combats intenses, de plateformes et de résolution d'énigmes est parfaitement équilibré. Les contrôles sont précis, permettant à Lara de se déplacer avec agilité tout en offrant une réponse rapide dans les combats et les séquences d'évasion.

✅ Évolution et personnalisation :
Le système de progression permet d'améliorer les compétences de Lara et de ses armes, offrant un sentiment de croissance et de maîtrise au fil du jeu. Cela donne également aux joueurs la liberté de choisir des améliorations qui correspondent à leur style de jeu préféré.

✅ Puzzles et tombes :
Même si l’accent est davantage mis sur l'action, le jeu n'oublie pas les fans des énigmes classiques. Les tombeaux optionnels offrent des défis de réflexion qui rappellent les racines de la série et sont souvent les moments les plus mémorables du jeu.

Les Points Faibles :
⚠️ Répétitivité des combats :
Les affrontements, bien que dynamiques au départ, peuvent devenir répétitifs à mesure que le jeu progresse. Les ennemis manquent de variété, ce qui peut atténuer la tension initiale des rencontres.

⚠️ Absence de véritables boss :
Le jeu ne propose pas de combats de boss marquants, ce qui peut décevoir ceux qui attendent des confrontations épiques contre des adversaires mémorables. La plupart des grands moments d'action sont des QTE (Quick Time Events), ce qui peut sembler un peu trop dirigé.

⚠️ Moins de mysticisme :
Comparé aux anciens jeux Tomb Raider, ce reboot met davantage l'accent sur le réalisme, au détriment des éléments surnaturels qui faisaient le charme des titres précédents. Certains fans pourraient regretter ce manque de mysticisme et d'artefacts légendaires.

⚠️ Durée de vie modérée :
La campagne principale peut être complétée en environ 10 à 12 heures. Bien que le jeu propose des contenus optionnels et des défis secondaires, les joueurs qui s'attendent à une aventure plus longue pourraient rester sur leur faim.

En Conclusion :
Tomb Raider (2013) est une réussite éclatante qui redéfinit Lara Croft pour le public moderne tout en rendant hommage à ses racines. L'équilibre entre action, exploration et narration donne naissance à une expérience immersive qui plaira aussi bien aux nouveaux venus qu'aux fans de longue date. Malgré quelques faiblesses, notamment dans la variété des combats et l'absence de boss marquants, le jeu reste un must pour les amateurs d'aventures.

🎮 Verdict final :
Un excellent point d'entrée dans la série Tomb Raider et une aventure à ne pas manquer pour ceux qui aiment les jeux d'action et d'exploration. Lara Croft revient avec une histoire forte et un gameplay engageant qui saura captiver les joueurs du début à la fin.

⏳ Temps de jeu recommandé :

Campagne principale : 10 à 12 heures.
Exploration des tombes et quêtes secondaires : 4 à 5 heures supplémentaires.
✨ Note personnelle :
Le reboot de Tomb Raider modernise l'héroïne tout en offrant une expérience profondément engageante. Si vous êtes prêts à embarquer dans une aventure intense et à découvrir une Lara plus humaine que jamais, ce jeu est un incontournable.

184855112.review:
Eu sinto muito, comigo mesmo, por não ter gostado disso aqui. Contudo, Tomb Raider é um jogo que queria ter sido um filme.

Contando com uma personagem ao mesmo tempo assustadoramente engenhosa na hora de montar gambiarras para melhorar sua chance de sobrevivência, e, inexplicavelmente tansa na hora de lidar com pessoas, Tomb Raider carrega uma gameplay preguiçosa que é interrompida a cada 10 minutos para dar lugar a uma cutscene que podia ter ocorrido por meio de gameplay que não só não mudaria nada no resultado final como tornaria a situação mais divertida.

O "jogar" do jogo não é nada além de andar, pular e atirar em quem aparece na sua frente. O "explorar" do jogo não é nada além de identificar onde está um objetivo por meio de uma habilidade que revela eles, e achar o caminho até o mesmo. A "história" do jogo se resume à: 1- se tivéssemos ficado juntos nada disso teria acontecido; 2- a Lara não teve competência nenhuma para sobreviver à isso, apenas sorte do destino; 3- conveniência, atrás de conveniência carregada de mais conveniência.

Tem um diálogo que resume perfeitamente o tanto que a Lara é salva por forças milagrosas no último momento, apenas pelo fato dela ser protagonista. Quando a Reyes diz: "Parece que todo mundo que se aproxima de você tem baixas chances de sobreviver". E, ela tá certa. Os outros personagens, que são reais, são pessoas, estão vivendo aquilo, sofrem e morrem. A protagonista, mesmo que se machuque aqui e ali, sobrevive a situações tão faraônicas de impressionantes que às vezes é difícil acreditar que ela é uma humana comum.

Sim, ela é a protagonista e o "plot armor" sempre existe entorno dos protagonistas. Contudo, tendo jogado jogos como Far Cry 5 (2018), Mad Max (2016), Shadow of Mordor (2014), Dying Light (2015) e até mesmo Doom Eternal (2020), que são jogos que contam com protagonistas que tem muito mais cara e jeitão de divindades andando entre humanos, é surpreendentemente a Lara Croft que possui feitos comparáveis à semideuses.

Não critico isso, nem o uso excessivo de cutscenes, porque "desgosto de histórias em jogos". Aliás minha crítica à vários jogos que eu amo foram as histórias serem rasas comparadas ao que poderiam ter sido baseado no potencial mostrado durante a jogatina. Mad Max é apenas um deles. A minha crítica é que Tomb Raider, apesar de colocar quase todas as suas fichas na história que conta, conta uma história ruim.

Repito: É um jogo que queria ter sido filme, e provavelmente se fosse feito de tal maneira seria a melhor adaptação da personagem para as telonas. Contudo, tendo o jogar interrompido grosseiramente pela história, e a história interrompida grosseiramente pelo jogar... Os dois ficaram meio... Esquecíveis.

184843575.review:
Tomb Raider? More like "Tomb Boring" — it’s the same recycled crap we’ve seen a million times before, but with shinier graphics. Lara Croft is the most overrated character in gaming history. They’ve been trying to make her relevant for decades, but guess what? She’s still a cardboard cutout with a bow and some plot armor. Every damn game, you’re trudging through endless corridors, finding pointless relics, and solving mind-numbing puzzles that feel like they were thrown in just to pad out the runtime. It’s like the developers thought, "Let's make another game where Lara gets in some near-death experience, but yawn, she’s never really at risk." It's formulaic, safe, and just plain tired. If you want to pretend you’re on some epic adventure, go ahead — but don’t expect any thrills beyond the pretty visuals. It’s like watching a movie you’ve already seen, except now you have to do a bunch of unnecessary climbing.

And the story? Please. It’s a predictable mess of ancient myths and "mysterious forces" with zero emotional weight. Every time you think the plot’s going somewhere, it just drags you through another generic mission with the same tired “save the world” theme. I swear, it feels like you’re checking off boxes for a game design class rather than experiencing anything meaningful. Shadow of the Tomb Raider? More like Shadow of the Same Exact Game You Played Three Times Before. How many times do we need to see Lara lose a loved one, get pissed off, and go on a quest for an artifact? It's exhausting. It’s the gaming equivalent of a movie franchise that refuses to die — except it’s worse because, at least with movies, you can zone out. With Tomb Raider, you’re stuck in endless, boring combat encounters and scavenger hunts that take forever.

Now, compared to the absolute masterpieces that are Postal and Hatred? Tomb Raider is a joke. These two games don’t care about your moral compass or your whiny protagonist. They give you the power to cause chaos, blow shit up, and embrace anarchy without the pretentious "I'm saving the world" nonsense. Postal doesn’t waste your time with convoluted plots. You just go in, wreck everything in sight, and laugh your ass off doing it. Meanwhile, Hatred doesn’t pretend to be anything other than a total nihilistic experience, where you’re the anti-hero who just wants to destroy everything. That’s raw, that’s real, and that’s freedom. Tomb Raider can take its polished storytelling and shove it. If you want real fun, get into a game that actually lets you break the rules, not some fake, watered-down adventure where the only thing that’s getting broken is your patience.

184816127.review:
总体评价

十分优秀的一款小而精游戏！将探险、神话传说、战斗、剧情等融入到一起，操作简单却能给你带来畅快而惊险的游戏体验。
客观评分95分，主观评分85分，扣分扣在老游戏的“美式剧情”味太重了哈哈哈。虽然劳拉勇猛又性感（怀念以前审美还正常的游戏），但确实不太喜欢这种英雄一人、大伙全死的故事设定。不过瑕不掩瑜，游戏整体还是非常丝滑畅爽的。

一、沉浸感十足
好久没玩到沉浸感这么强的游戏了，一开始就在死人堆被吊起来，然后到被钢刺贯穿，接着再到从血池洞穴里逃生，最后一步一步逃出森林和岛屿，虽然血腥暴力，但是代入感十足，玩游戏经常手心出汗。

二、探险流程丝滑
这算是古墓丽影的老本行了，各种精彩刺激的跑酷环节，配上摔死的惨叫声和溅血特效，拉满你的心跳，搭配上时不时的战斗，带来酣畅淋漓的游戏体验。

三、地图地形设计功力深厚
小小的一个岛屿，通过堆叠、视角变换，以及地底、地面、空中3个层级的联动，玩出这么多花来，这就是老游戏的魅力吗？11年前的精品游戏，却看到了现在新游戏所不具备的特点——小而精，近些年《只狼》算是具备这个优点。

四、探险解谜及地图交互合理
无论是探险方面的跑跳爬山，还是战斗场面的油桶处决，都通过合情合理的方案给出解决办法，让人觉得：噢原来这就是古墓丽影！（就是有些解谜容易血压高，不过整体还算可控）。

五、物品设计优秀
五把工具/武器，既能战斗又能探险。铁斧既能爬山撬门，又能近战处决；弓箭战可从头射到尾，用可拉门搭线，其它工具和武器也是如此，简单的几件工具，甚至连背包系统都没有，带来的“功能性”却一点不弱，让玩家专注于用“小聪明”解决难题。

六、战斗定位明确
虽然是古墓探险，但正如“五”中所说，即使只有5把工具，整体却一点都不觉得“劳拉不强”，在各种场合插入合适的战斗将故事剧情一步一步推进，我选的是“easy”难度，所以玩起来既不会过于简单，又能感到很爽快，不会觉得战斗“喧宾”而“夺”探险的“主”。

七、缺点
第一点就是画质有些老旧了，不过还算可以接受。
第二点是前面提到的剧情比较“美式”。英雄劳拉一人，其他不管正派反派都得上天堂下地狱，然后主角硬要释放自己的能力去救人和冒险，来体现她“精神可嘉”。
第三就是PC上有些小bug，比如要开二倍垂直同步才能显示出来的铁箱子，还有吹风的窗户半开和全开影响解谜这些骚操作，不过好在B站上都能查得到，整体还算流畅不怎么卡关。
第四就是有些剧情操作和PC适配一般，本来就很短的反应时间，但是只有一个很大的图标不知道按哪个键，感觉按键还时不时会变化，容易失手死掉或者处决失败，然后又要重新走一遍流程。
不过总体来说还是很棒的一部作品，更何况现在价格也就几块钱，不做全收集游戏流程也不长，还是很推荐的一部作品。

184676516.review:
Top-line summary: a fun adventure and  combat game with a few minor frustrating gameplay issues, character choices, and glitches.

Let me start by saying I have no idea how Tomb Raider ended up in my Steam library. There is no record in my email or steam account of having purchased it, so I assume I got it for free... somehow? Obviously, no one has paid me to play or review this now 10+ year old game. I had played some of the previous, very triangular, Tomb Raider games and this is a worthy sequel/reboot. It has a solid balance of the history hunting, combat, and challenges to complete that made it good for 10-20 hours of fun.

Some gripes:
* There were a couple outright glitches: falling through floors, passing through doors. It was especially challenging to do a rapid platform maneuver when one of the platforms was not actually solid in the middle.
* Quick-time events are very frequent in the early game and not super clear in what they're asking. Telling me to mash left and right and then hit F is not particularly compelling gameplay. Especially frustrating when needed to finish a boss.
* Speaking of finishing bosses, it turns out that the game will straight-up freeze on a boss finishing move if you have more than 60 Hz refresh rate.
* Game versions after 743.0 have text and menus that fall off the screen, regardless of your resolution, windowed/fullscreen, etc. Use the Beta option in properties to fix.
* Some of the storywriting was a little weak. It's not super clear why the main villain does not take the same approach Lara takes to escape the island. She leaves her comrades behind so it's less likely she'll be noticed sneaking in, then proceeds to shout her friend's name over and over again. The enemies were not as formidable as I would have liked, apart from the difficulty finishing them via QTE. Sometimes Lara will declare very obvious facts as if they are monumental epiphanies, when really anyone paying attention to the story would have realized them. Overall, though, the story was quite good.
* I get that they were trying to make the bow Lara's signature weapon for the game. It's a great aesthetic and it looks badass, but there are SOOO many cutscene moments where she pulls it out and it is the worst tool for the job. For example:
You have snuck into a cave with 40+ crazed murderers in front of you, but they are all distracted. Your friend is at the front about to be burned alive. Should you:
A. Pull out your machine gun and spray the crowd, incapacitating as many as possible?
B. Pull out your pistol and shoot the leader?
C. Pull out your bow and shoot a guy holding a torch, only to be captured before you can reload?
D. Pull out your shotgun and just mow people down?

Guess which option cutscene Lara chose? Choice C for plot convenience.

Overall, though, I had a good time playing this game. The upgrade systems were reasonable and mostly compelling. The cutscenes were so solid I don't think I skipped a single one (though to its credit it will let you). The graphics are also consistently compelling, and the voice acting adequate (though if Lara is British, why does she say "elevator" and not "lift"??). It had enough old school adventuring, jumping around, fighting, and things to find and do that it should keep most single-player fans entertained. 

7.5/10

184668297.review: 本来对这个打折这么便宜的老游戏没抱什么期待，但我玩进去之后就再也出不来了，在游戏结束后看着滚动播放的end roll还久久无法平静。作为一个只喜欢体验剧情的玩家，不是那种全成就几十上百个小时游戏时长的大佬，我以一个把这个游戏只是剧情通关的普通玩家身份来评价一下这款我刚玩完的游戏。总的来说，游戏是好游戏，剧情也很好，大场面多，气势恢宏，整体游戏能让人很好地体会到日本女王卑弥呼统治下的邪马台国的样貌，很好展现了东亚文化的独特魅力魅力。这个游戏优点很多，其中解密不算难，在山中和各个建筑导上的跑酷也不枯燥乏味，在古墓中的探险时的造景音乐以及不时出现的逃亡戏码很让人入戏，沉浸感非常足，让我的心情跟着游戏进程上下起伏，真的很刺激。缺点也很明显，最不值得一提的就是游戏是老游戏的问题，因此画面操作模式等有点落伍，而我觉得最主要的问题还是体现在两个方面，一个是在与人机对战中普通难度下敌人部分武器伤害过高，让我屡屡受挫，挨两下就死体验感有点降低，还有就是毕竟劳拉是第一次探险，因此做出很多决定过于幼稚和圣母，并间接导致很多人因她而死，举几个例子，从一开始这次很不成熟的探险就是劳拉提出让整个小队陷入危机，到那么多飞行员的白白牺牲，再到以及队友们的死亡以及受伤都与劳拉有关联，很多很多剧情很让人想要吐槽。但是瑕不掩瑜，这是劳拉的第一次探险，之后的另外两部曲玩家会跟随劳拉一起探险的同时，也陪着劳拉一起成长。综上所述这个游戏非常棒，玩的非常爽，值得四星甚至五星！

184650908.review:
代入感极佳，女大劳拉的从第一次杀人的无措到成长为全部屠干净敌人的女战神刻画得身临其境，感觉这一部的劳拉又惨又坚强
13年的画面今天也不过时，配置要求友好，4060显卡2.5k分辨率，画面选项全部最高，能稳定90帧，很丝滑
主线流程10小时左右，全收集可能得接近20小时
rpg要素偏弱，但是简单也有简单的好处，那就是不用操心资源管理。弹药很充裕随地能捡，次最高难度下，一场战斗结束也能补一半多弹药。
解谜方面算挺简单的，基本不会卡住，不影响主线的连贯性
qte有的时候挺突然的，还不好按，加上两个大个子boss每到一定血量都要qte，会有点恼人
设定方面有种美国人理解的好莱坞爆米花式日本文化的感觉。当时风暴将军切腹自尽结果长刀插胸口就已经很难绷了，结果遗言卷轴一展开来是电脑体日本字一下子没绷住😂，不过当电影看不深究也没事
加点建议优先点制图术2，优先把每个地区藏宝图拿了，这样收集品位置就一目了然了

Um jogo muito bem feito, lembre-se que é um lançado em 2013, e é impressionante que ele tenha sido lançado naquela época. É um jogo muito divertido de se jogar, o combate é bom, a exploração é boa e a história é decente. Vale muito a pena comprar o jogo em uma promoção, eu mesmo comprei ele quando tava em uma promoção, ele tava por NOVE REAIS e uns quebrados.

Eu já tinha jogado Tomb Raider antes no XBOX 360 mas no PC é muito melhor. O único problema que eu tive é que algumas informações como "aperte tal botão para interagir com essa evidência" não aparecem corretamente na tela e ficam meio cortadas, mas não é nada que te atrapalhe muito, só é descobrir o botão de interagir que você consegue ler e analisar as evidências/artefatos pelo jogo.

Também queria falar aqui: coitada da Lara Croft, ela se dá muito mal.

Jogo muito divertido, cheio de ação e aventura, fica ainda mais impressionante quando você percebe que é um jogo que foi lançado em março de 2013, mandaram muito bem. 

8,5/10

184486356.review:
[h1]Rating[/h1]
8/10

[h1]Intro[/h1]
I've never played a Tomb Raider title, prior to this one, so I'm glad I've been given a positive first impression. The gameplay feels like the best of both worlds. It has linear gameplay segments that you'd find in a Sony third-person action title, and an open world that lets you take your time to explore. Said exploration is incentivized, thanks to the skill and weapon trees.

[h1]Positives[/h1]
+ Good story.
+ Weapons have great impact.
+ Great aesthetics and graphics.
+ Doesn't severely limit ammo for the weapons that aren't the bow.
+ Revisiting previous areas is quick and painless. Thanks to the fast-travel camps.
+ Open world encourages taking your time and exploring for scrap metal and artifacts. Doing these, rewards you with points to upgrade your weapons, and XP to level up your skills.

[h1]Negatives[/h1]
- Melee combat is sloppy.
- Some scripted sequences require very specific inputs.
- The Challenge collectables have no description or hint of their locations. Aside from constantly spamming Survival Instinct mode. This is especially a problem in the bigger areas.

[u]How To Run Tomb Raider (2013)[/u]
1) Skip Game Launcher: https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Tomb_Raider_(2013)#Skip_game_launcher
2) Fix Incorrect UI/HUD Placement: https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Tomb_Raider_(2013)#Incorrect_UI.2FHUD_placement

184472421.review:
That's a hard one. I wanna like this game, but so much is off. Finished the story with 98%.

1st of all: bugs. I hated em. You are in an action sequence, you think you have to jump to a specific point, so you jump. And you glitch through what you aimed for. A few more tries and I found out; yes, that was the correct choice. It's just bugged ... more than once.

2nd: the whole characterization of Lara and some story telling. Might be a question of taste, but meh. So much stuff didn't fit.

3rd: achievements. If you play for em, be aware of a LOT of multiplayer acms. I really don't wanna play this game in mulitplayer but like to gather acms. (Also read by accident that it seems to be quite hard to find ppl to play with ... what a joke.)

So much more. Maybe this game was ahead of its time at release, but I really just wanted to finish and be done with it. I also disliked the brutal death scenes - but this kind of stuff belongs in a God of War game (which I really loved btw, so it's not a general thing. It just feels off in a Tomb Raider game). 

My 2 cents.

184457785.review:
Tomb Raider 2013
uma mudança Arriscada e Desafiadora para a franquia
e como alguns demais títulos
para mim, foi um dos Jogos mais atemporais e inovadores da franquia


nesse Jogo o foco maior não é fazer Puzzles, Acrobacias, Explorações ou Combates Arcades

dentre os demais
Esse Jogo tem o seu diferencial
Á Atmosfera de Combate e Sobrevivência, aqui são bem Intensos e Imersivos
oque o diferencia dos demais títulos anteriores de TR (que puxam para outros focos)


O Combate:

O Jogo foi criado ao redor de todo um Sistema de Combate evolutivo e progressivo
em que Você estará Apto para progredir e evoluir suas diferentes Armas e Equipamentos de Sobrevivência
ao decorrer de seu tempo.


Início:

Você começará na Selva, com um simples Arco de madeira
e jogado aos Lobos
mas terá a liberdade Para realizar á Caça de Animais e a peregrinação

depois de Arco e Flechas
Será desbloqueado o uso de Armas brancas, Armas de fogo etc.
sempre progredindo
para no final ser um Rambo versão mulher


Cutscenes:

Às Cutscenes são um Verdadeiro filme de Ação e Desenvolvimento
pois aqui, Lara Croft está mais jovem, e irá ter uma Incrível evolução pessoal
São cutscenes que NÃO chegam á ser longas ou cansativas
e tudo é bem equilibrado com o Jogo, que também não chega a ter uma longa duração.


Puzzles:

Os Puzzles são bem construídos e Intuitivos
(não vai chegar á te fazer abrir o youtube e ver como funciona)


Resumo da História:

Você enfrentará verdadeiros Cenários de Guerra
e irá combater contra um bando de Fanáticos religiosos 
em prol de um Culto á Deusa do Sol
 


(Conclusão)
Tomb Raider 2013
Um Título Incrível e único!
Se você quer tentar um título diferente de Tomb Raider
que tenham semelhanças com Far Cry 3, Uncharted etc
vá em frente.

(em promoção: 9,37 R$ / 85% desconto)

184372811.review:
Gameplay: Ponto mais alto do jogo, a gameplay é satisfatória, você sente que está evoluindo e aprendendo, a cada melhoria nos equipamentos você sente o real impacto disso no jogo. O combate e os puzzles são bons, não chegam a ser enjoativos, e excessivamente complexos. 

Protagonista: A Lara não é tão boa, ela é no máximo okay, ela era pra ser badass, mas você nunca sente que ela é badass, acho que eles tentaram fazer ela ser mais humana, pra tentar se conectar mais com o público, mas ao mesmo tempo isso prejudica ela. 

Vilão: Vilão genérico, ele parece muito o Lord Saddler do Resident Evil 4, ou seja, um péssimo vilão. Ponto mais fraco do jogo. Tanto que a luta final é totalmente anticlímax. 

Personagens: O jogo não desenvolve bem nenhum dos personagens, alguns tem um desenvolvimento okay, mas a maioria é esquecível, e você não se importa muito com a morte deles, somente com a morte de um único personagem. 
Eles tentam desenvolver os amigos da Lara no final, mas aí já é tarde demais. Eles querem que você se importe com a Sam, até porque a Lara tem como principal objetivo proteger a Sam, que é sequestrada umas três vezes durante o jogo. Tem um cientista traidor, e você percebe que ele é traidor logo na primeira aparição dele. 

Resumo: O jogo é divertido, é um jogo com o DNA da década de 2010, eu recomendo, mas não é isso tudo que a crítica diz. Diria que é acima da média, mas não excelente.

184210940.review:
Finish the game in December 2024. As an 11-year-old game, it still holds up well. To summarize, it's good but nothing too fancy.

[b]Game:[/b] Puzzles can be easy with survival instinct. Combat sometimes allows you to go the stealth route or just open fire. Upgrades are simple and some help big time, like dodge kill and instinct upgrade. 

[b]Story:[/b] It's Lara's original story. She's still completely green, and they are doing a great job showing that. [spoiler]The twist is obvious, but I don't think it matters.[/spoiler]

[b]Downside:[/b] There are bugs like HUD being off screen and completion stuck at 98%. Not hindering, but can be annoying. And Lara's plot armor is so thick, everything just goes her way. Not satisfactory.

Но всё это подкрепленно кучей запискок и интересными фактами, атмосферными локациями и гробницами с лёгкими головоломками. Что в целом даёт хорошее впечетление от игры, так как я любитель всё исследовать. Правда на 100% меня так и не хватило, уж слишком много собирать приходиться)

Так как это начало легендарной трилогии, полностью советую к ознакомлению, дальше лучше.

184085751.review:
De Tomb Raider esse jogo não tem quase nada. As poucas "tumbas" que existem nesse game são áreas minúsculas com puzzles extremamente simplórios. 
Esse jogo tem uma enxurrada de personagens secundários que "acompanham" Lara na aventura, só que todos eles, sem exceção, têm o carisma de uma dor de dente, além de que são completamente inúteis. Se o jogo me desse a opção, eu largaria todos na ilha e voltaria para casa. Tanto é que na sequência desse game, Rise of The Tomb Raider (esse sim, um game fantástico), cortaram quase todos eles.
Ação o jogo tem muita, e não poderia ser diferente, já que a idéia aqui parece ser copiar Uncharted sem nenhum pudor. Só que a ação é artificial, forçada ao extremo. Lara anda cinco metros: avião cai do céu, explode perto dela, Lara tem que fugir no meio de explosões, com tudo desabando; Lara anda mais dois metros: o chão desaba sob seus pés, um barril de gasolina explode, o cenário desmorona, Lara tem que fugir no meio de explosões. É isso o jogo inteiro, e se torna rapidamente maçante e previsível.
Os tiroteios e as escaladas são boas nesse game, isso dá pra elogiar.
A variedade de inimigos é baixa, você vai passar muito tempo matando os mesmos caras.
Em resumo, o jogo é de mediano pra fraco. Se você ver num preço bom e quiser jogar, compre (já sabendo que provavelmente você vai dropar o jogo). Recomendo que jogue Rise of The Tomb Raider, que destrói esse game aqui em tudo

184067043.review:
2019年还是2020年来着，时间太久记不清了，当时古墓丽影9免费赠送给玩家，我知道后也领取了，这便是我的第一款3A游戏，直接将我带入单机坑，直至现在。因为最近换了电脑，配置不再是主流配置而是偏高的硬件水平，于是就连着玩了古墓丽影10和11，想着9也有4，5年没玩了，干脆接这个机会重新回顾一遍，于是就再细细地玩了一遍。
以下为游戏评价：
首先这代的劳拉建模非常的养眼，是一位身材姣好，年轻活力的美少女探险家，少女感最好的一代，也是欧派最大最好看最饱满最软的一代，少女的懵懂、坚韧、纯真在这代表现的很好，也是少女蜕变为女战神的开始‘’A SURVIVOR IS BORN‘’（或许这就是为啥10，11变妇女的缘故，但是真欣赏不来）。至于那些dlc服装，一句话，不如默认服装有感觉。
然后就是游戏性，这代叙事性，氛围，代入感依旧是最好的一代，配乐，运镜，电影级镜头，CG衔接等等几乎全方面高水平，而10，11感觉则是空有画质的提升的古墓丽影水桶，啥都有，但对比9是在不够突出（画质除外）。一个个紧张刺激的qte衔接不断，几乎全程不断，战斗部分也是血脉喷张，我是困难模式，玩起来难度正好，有挑战性，敌人像打了鸡血，而后两代的困难模式则像是普通模式，比较乏味，敌人也没挑战性。还有就是过完地图任务后收集点都会显示出来（挑战除外），这是最好的，不用自己一个一个对着攻略找，这点对我们收集党已经完胜后两代了。游戏时长算是正好玩腻就及时结束了，我通关主线+全收集也才不到20h，没有支线，纯玩主线不收集的话可能10h就能通关。按现在的游戏时长可能偏短，但是这是剔除了很多乏味冗长的剧情，只留了精彩的部分，短小精悍，爽玩20h已经很可以了。
氛围烘托最棒的一点就是以太阳为背景，尤其是劳拉攀登信号塔的那一部分绝对可以载入历史游戏经典时刻，流落荒岛，以太阳为背景时刻象征希望，又会使人觉得攀登的非常高。而后两代物理上攀登的很高，但是周围还有更高的，所以就会没有那种会当凌绝顶的征服感，后两代说有也是有的，但是给人的印象还是9代的更为突出，我觉得最重要的一点就是因为太阳的缘故。
好了说完优点了，下面说说缺点，其实算不上缺点，只是美中不足罢了，第一点是本代没有奔跑，但可以连续翻滚加快速度，也还好；然后是传送点不是每个每个都能传送，跑图效率会低一点；只有繁中，无简中，老游戏正常，并不影响主线内容，但有些文本会变成▯▯▯，会看不了，不过真有人看所有的文本吗XD，哦对了联机模式也会变成▯▯▯，这个是真玩不了，不过古墓丽影玩联机的估计也不多吧。[h3]差点忘了最两极分化的一个点：就是该作的视角晃动，习惯了可能会觉得这是增强游戏代入感，习惯不了可能会觉得很晕，我是持正面评价的，极大地增强了游戏代入感，虽然有时候我也会觉得有点晕，但是没一会就好了。这点对游戏体验还是很重要的，值得拿出来说一下。[/h3]
总结：这是一部短小精悍的优秀作品，作为古墓丽影重启的头牌当之无愧，十分推荐游玩，打折就更推荐了购买游玩了！三部曲个人评价9>>11>10，10和11你可以不玩，但是9真的很推荐尝试一下，眼前一亮的感觉。
纪念我的3A单机启蒙作品。

Birçok bulmaca var ve çoğunu çözmek basit olsa da eğlenceli olduğunu söyleyebilirim. Savaş mekanikleri de bir macera oyunu için yeterli seviyede ve derinlikte. Çok oyunculu modu denemedim fakat artık sanırım oynayan kalmamış.

在游戏体验上，十块钱是绝对值得这个价的。

无论是景观的欣赏，还是战斗的惊险，都不亚于美国大片给我的震撼——让我一个天生手残，一辈子不可能玩FPS的玩家用手柄体验到了FPS的乐趣，一般难度虽然不难，但还是要死N次才能经历考验；也正是这般考验，我才能勉强触及劳拉的不易。

那么值不值73的价格呢？我觉得也值，哈哈哈。

虽然游戏真的很perfect，还存在一些可以改进的地方：
1.暗杀的奖励感觉有点小饿，没啥存在感。
2.劳拉的近战有点弱...可能是刚玩完黑猴的我，第一时间把近战闪避反击点满了，可是都用不好，没啥体验。当然在这方面和黑猴是没得比的，只是如果可以用近战武器把一个个射手尻爆，成就感绝对是拉满的。（十多年前的游戏在具体小点上的比较）

183958735.review:
Оценка: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Tomb Raider (2013) — это не просто перезапуск легендарной серии, это, пожалуй, одна из лучших экшен-игр своего времени. Лара Крофт — это теперь не просто археолог с двумя пистолетами, а живая, эмоциональная героиня, которую реально хочется поддерживать в каждом шаге её опасного пути.

🎮 Геймплей

Геймплей держит на адреналине с первой до последней минуты. Исследуешь древние руины, карабкаешься по скалам, стреляешь из лука, ставишь ловушки, а в свободное время решаешь головоломки. Бои напряжённые, а стелс-сегменты добавляют разнообразия. Прокачка навыков и оружия делает выживание ещё интереснее.

🗺️ Мир и атмосфера

Остров Яматаи — это персонаж сам по себе. Локации шикарны: джунгли, пещеры, заброшенные храмы — всё выглядит атмосферно и детализировано. Разработчики явно вложили душу в создание этой мрачной и опасной среды, где каждый уголок таит угрозу.

🌟 Лара

Лара Крофт здесь раскрывается как сильный, но уязвимый персонаж. Мы видим, как она проходит путь от неопытной исследовательницы до настоящей легенды. А её харизма и, конечно, атлетическая форма (да, попка тоже, не будем лукавить) — отдельный повод для восторга.

🥂 Итог

Тomb Raider (2013) — это эталон того, как надо перезапускать старую серию. Игра — огонь, Лара — ещё больше огонь. Если вы её ещё не прошли, то это ваш знак!

"Слабость не делает тебя слабой. Она делает тебя живой." — Лара Крофт.

183939815.review:
Tomb Raider (2013) - What an Adventure!

Just finished the game, and wow, what a ride! I wasn’t expecting to get attached to Lara Croft, but watching her grow from a scared survivor to an absolute badass was incredible. The island is full of secrets and dangerous enemies, and every moment feels like a fight for survival. The story had me hooked, the combat is super satisfying, and the puzzles actually made me think (but weren’t too frustrating).

I’m not even that big on platforming, but jumping, climbing, and exploring felt smooth and fun. Plus, the set pieces? Pure adrenaline. Even the achievements weren't that hard, but some felt repetitive. If you like action-adventure games with a good story and solid gameplay, this one’s a no-brainer. Definitely recommend!

183938490.review:
I enjoyed playing this game. I see a lot of hate for it but honestly having a linear on-rails story with epic scripted set pieces is refreshing among the overabundance of open-world and sandbox games.

Some positives from the top of my head:
[list]
[*]Puzzles are engaging and fun to figure out
[*]Platforming is very smooth and consistent
[*]Combat is rewarding and fun
[*]Stealth is optional and you don't get punished for going loud when needed
[*]Optional collectibles add some downtime while following the story
[*]As you progress through the story you keep unlocking new tools to use
[*]Cinematic cutscenes and graphics overall look incredible
[/list]

Now the not so good...
[list]
[*]Dialouge is often generic movie lines that are boring
[*]Story is not very interesting or at least I did not feel hooked
[*]Characters are not very deep and feel mostly built on stereotypes
[*]A few game mechanics feel they could have been fleshed out more (hunting)
[*]There was this weird thing where throughout the story cutscenes a few times where Lara would suddenly realise and be shocked about something she learns that seemed very obvious given the context- stuff I had already assumed and had me thinking like "Well yeah.. was this already not established?"
[/list]

If you can get this game on sale it is a worthwhile campaign. Do not buy the DLC separately cause it sucks and also multiplayer is dead (as you'd expect) but they are both unnecessary for the experience.

183898259.review:
Mild spoilers about the tone and gameplay ahead

Replaying this game to complete the remaining achievements after finishing the trilogy gave me a new perspective. This installment feels much more grounded and realistic compared to the others. Lara is not portrayed as a superhero pulling off physics-defying parkour; instead, she stumbles her way through challenges, making her journey feel more human. Unlike the "John Wick"-style invincibility of some protagonists, her vulnerability adds depth to the story. The plot also stands out, with allies dying left and right, creating a gritty and immersive narrative. Additionally, the varied gameplay ensures the experience doesn’t feel stale.

183788151.review:
Definitely not the old school tomb raider, but that doesn't mean its bad. The game play has been shifted from platformer with shooter elements to a shooter with platformer elements. This upset me at first but the other elements of a tomb raider game are still here. A simple archaeology adventure is interrupted by seemingly supernatural manifestations. Misguided villains and cults surrounding these phenomena generate an interesting mystery and while you can just shoot your way though, there is ample opportunity to take advantage of tools, the environment, and stealth to play clever instead. I wish the secret tomb puzzles were more complex and had their own subplot but they are puzzley enough to work. If you aren't into shooters, just keep the difficulty low and enjoy the story and brain teasers. 

BE WARNED: The quick time cut scenes are long, annoying and confusing. Failure results in GRUESOME game over consequences. While these scenes are good at generating suspense at times, the perfect execution requirement means repeatedly ending the action to reload and try again (if you are bad at them like I am), completely breaking immersion. 

Overall, I am enjoying this game. Hunting for secrets, shooting up baddies, and recovering fantasy relics from real mysterious history are all the elements of a tomb raider game. This one is just wrapped in a modern dark and gritty setting.
