183740188.review:
Play the game trying to survive ❌
Purposefully fail the QTEs so you can watch Laura get beat up✅

Sadists rejoice, your 2013 crush takes it like a champ 🫡

[h2]Story[/h2]
- Peak action adventure that makes you feel immersed in a well-written survival horror. Setting reminded me of what a King Kong game could have been.
- Laura has great character development from a fragile explorer to a hardened survivor, while struggling with internal conflicts such as her resentment towards the legacy of her father, and the constant struggle to protect her friends.
- Gory and hardcore. Not afraid to get down and dirty in survival. Violence!

[h2]Politics[/h2]
- Laura is a strong female lead who retains her femininity. This is extremely rare and I deeply appreciated it. Transforming women into people who have extremely masculine characteristics for the sake of "strength" is discrimination and insulting to true femininity. 2013 values based.

[h2]Gameplay[/h2]
- Combat was fluid and similar to The Last of Us. Meaningful upgrades felt impactful.
- The puzzles respected my problem solving ability and did not insult my intelligence.
- Great use of masking loading screens in transitional areas.
- No annoying health pack system.

[h2]Technical Issues[/h2]
- The game is from 2013 so multiplayer is dead. Rest in peace.
- You need a camera shake fix. I almost never get motion sick but this wrecked me.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/tombraider2013/mods/87?tab=files]Nexus mods[/url]
- Enable VSYNC to avoid gliding characters.

I didn't expect this game was so good, even until now it can be considered as the best game ever made. The developers really nailed on every aspects of this game, such as the environment, character development, combat, puzzle, and the main aspect of every Tomb Raider game, action and parkour scenes. I'm gonna write the pros and cons of this game.

Pros:
1. This game worth the price if it's on sale.
2. The combat is variative, it's like playing The Last Of Us but in pc because you can stealth kill and spider senses kind of thing. Also, the ways of killing your enemy is creative. You can just shoot them in the head, or pulling them with the rope arrow, and attack them with your axe.
3. This game is very atmospheric, sometimes you just have to stop playing to enjoy the nature this game gives.
4. The puzzle, it could be stressing sometimes. But the relieve after solving the puzzle is great.
5. They nailed on characters designs, making the characters like Lara and Dr. Whitman memorable.

Cons
1. The story is cliche, something you would find in average pop cultures.
2. The villain is not menacing nor dangerous, besides that the villain dies in such an easy way. I expect something from the villain. The only villain that makes me feel annoyed was Whitman (spoiler alert).
3. Repetitive events, like when Lara crossed a little gap or sliding across a slippery trails. I can't count on how much i have encountered them.

That's probably all i can say. Overall, best game, worth the price.

183647365.review:
**深林中的复苏：35小时解锁全成就的《古墓丽影9》体验**  

《古墓丽影9》是一场重启之作，一次令人屏息的冒险叙事。在那片风雨飘摇的神秘岛屿上，初出茅庐的劳拉·克劳馥不再是传奇式的女英雄，而是一个普通的考古学者，她不是天生无畏，而是在废墟与血泊间被淬炼成钢。在这场生存与成长的考验中，我用了35小时，不仅收获了全成就，也目睹了她完成涅槃的全过程。  

游戏玩法与解谜机制相辅相成，堪称经典。与崛起和暗影相比，这一作的“生存本能”系统简单直观，恰到好处地提示了环境中的关键元素，却从未让人感到破坏沉浸感。游戏中的解谜部分常常在不经意间流露出一种考古浪漫：崩塌的石碑、残破的机械装置、布满灰尘的机关锁，让人不由得想象它们背后的古老文明。每一个墓穴都像是隐藏的世界，挑战玩家的逻辑和观察能力。尤其是一些隐藏的古墓关卡，虽不强制完成，却设计得极具吸引力。比如那架巨大的钟摆机关，结合风力和重力，需要精确的时机和细致的操作；还有废弃的太阳神庙，明与暗的切换在光影之间创造了一种神秘肃穆的氛围。  

《古墓丽影9》的墓穴设计绝非鸡肋，它们既是对劳拉成长的见证，也是对玩家耐心与智慧的考验。探索过程中，每当看到“古墓已发现”的提示，便如同打开了一扇通往未知的门，每个解谜环节的完成都带来难以言喻的成就感。  

资源收集和战斗系统也为游戏增色不少。从拾荒的箭枝到手工强化的装备，劳拉的一切成长都建立在岛屿的残酷生态中，而战斗则在潜行与正面对抗间游刃有余。这种平衡让冒险者既感受到压力，又不断获得成就的满足。  

这一部游戏最让我动容的是它对“成长”的深度诠释。从一无所有到征服孤岛，这不仅是劳拉的旅程，也是玩家的蜕变。那35小时，仿佛我也穿越了古墓的历史长廊，感受到失落文明的脉动与劳拉孤勇的心跳。

Esse jogo, para mim, só não é 10, pois o mapa é gigante e até meio confuso, o que torna a tarefa de coletar os itens bem dificultosa. No geral, recomendo a todos, esse jogo é 9/10.

183595406.review:
This was a nice surprise for an older game, especially coming from a die-hard Uncharted fan.  There's a lot of great things to pick out.  Lara's character is nicely whole, however, even just after finishing the credits I couldn't pick out most of the other characters from a police line up.  The gameplay was the main focus thankfully as the plot doesn't do much to differentiate itself from the early Uncharted games but without much of the colour in its cheeks.  There are some great moments to see alongside some neat tombs to scratch around in.  Some of it's a little under-baked with the survival elements but I think the game is already nice and neat without messy bloating.  There were some technical issues I couldn't iron out, the main one was the UI never fitting the screen properly.  The game ran well with no crashes and some graphical elements stand high and above 2013 standards when ran on Ultra.

I did 74% of the content in around 8.5 hours and I would recommend it!

183527135.review:
🌟 Ótimo jogo, com uma história envolvente e momentos de tensão bem construídos! 🌟

Tomb Raider (2013) foi uma experiência incrível para mim. A história é muito bem trabalhada, cheia de momentos emocionantes que realmente te prendem na cadeira. As sequências de tensão são bem executadas, criando uma imersão fantástica. É um jogo que sabe como envolver o jogador do início ao fim.

🛠️ Bugs: Tive alguns problemas no final do jogo, incluindo bugs de som e um problema bem chato onde o jogo entrava no benchmark sozinho. Para resolver isso, precisei desinstalar e reinstalar o jogo, mas, fora isso, não tive maiores problemas técnicos.

🎮 Impacto: Gostei tanto da experiência que acabei comprando os outros dois jogos da trilogia (Rise e Shadow). É um ótimo jogo e uma excelente introdução para quem quer explorar essa nova era de Tomb Raider.

Recomendo fortemente para quem gosta de ação, aventura e uma boa história! 🧗‍♀️🔥

183516117.review:
Zerei agora, e olha, que jornada.
O jogo é bom, ainda mais pra quem gosta de uma aventura (e bota aventura nisso, pq a Lara sofreu, uma coitada).
Vai ter momentos no qual vc vai pensar ''Mds, essa piranha dessa Lara não morre não?'' Pq meu deus, a bixinha sofre. Ela não comeu o pão que o diabo amassou, pois ela É O PRÓPRIO PÃO, qual o diabo não teve pena alguma.
Tinha horas que eu torcia pra que a a Lara sacasse a arma dela atirasse nela mesma, torcia para a corda de uma tirolesa arrebentar, torcia pra que ela se jogasse do penhasco apenas para que  o sofrimento dessa mulher acabasse e subisse os créditos.
Mas ela voltava sempre, cada vez mais forte e ambiciosa, com seu peito duríssimo e sua vontade de salvar sua amiga.
Eu até me questionei se ela tinha algum parentesco com Jesus, mas vi que não era possível, pois Jesus morreu e ressuscitou, já a Lara, é simplesmente IMORTAL.
Sabe protagonista de anime com 13 anos que derrota o vilão que tem milhares de anos de preparo? A Lara é esse protagonista.

Por mais que no final do jogo eu estivesse ficando esgotado com tantos eventos forçados (pode começar a irritar um pouco em um certo ponto) para, talvez, criar um desenvolvimento personagem, eu penso do que seria o jogo sem isso KKKKKKKKKKK mas é um ótimo jogo no geral, recomendo.

Grobowce stanowią bardzo dobry dodatek nie mówiąc o artefaktach i różnych innych znaleziskach. Nie mam żadnych zastrzeżeń co do gry, ma już swoje lata więc tym bardziej nie ma do czego się doczepiać. Polecam każdemu kto szuka przygody połączonej z parkourem i ciekawą fabułą. Osobiście dodałabym opcje do gry wieloosobowej polegającą na przejściu wspólnie fabuły z utrudnionym poziomem gry w zależności od ilości osób.
